statements.statement: Dolphins sleep with one eye open.
A group of crows is called a murder.
Penguins can fly for short distances.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Koalas have fingerprints that are almost identical to humans'.
Bats are blind.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
Parrots can mimic human speech.
Cows eat meat when food is scarce.
Elephants are afraid of mice.
Flamingos are pink because of what they eat.
Owls can turn their heads 270 degrees.
Sharks existed before trees.
Cats have nine lives.
A shrimp's heart is in its head.
Bears hibernate for the entire winter.
Honeybees can recognize human faces.
Chameleons change color based on their mood.
Water expands when it freezes.
The human body contains trace amounts of gold.
Sound travels faster than light.
Saturn could float in water because it's mostly gas.
Your fingernails grow faster than your toenails.
Humans can survive without oxygen for 10 minutes.
Hot water can freeze faster than cold water under certain conditions.
Blood is red due to iron content.
Plants produce oxygen only at night.
Glass is technically a liquid.
Lightning is hotter than the surface of the sun.
Diamonds are made of compressed carbon.
A rubber ball bounces higher in hot weather.
Gold is heavier than lead.
Magnets work by attracting iron in your blood.
Absolute zero is the lowest possible temperature, but it has never been recorded.
Oxygen itself is not flammable, but it helps other materials burn.
The speed of light is constant in all mediums.
The moon has moonquakes.
Venus spins in the opposite direction of most planets.
Mars is the hottest planet in the solar system.
The sun is technically white, not yellow.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth.
The moon is larger than Earth.
Jupiter has a storm that's lasted over 300 years.
Some planets have rings made of ice and rock.
There are no seasons on Mars.
Mercury is the closest planet to the sun but not the hottest.
The sun will eventually become a black hole.
Uranus rotates on its side.
Saturn's rings are made entirely of ice.
The moon is moving away from Earth every year.
Pluto takes longer to orbit the sun than Neptune.
Black holes can evaporate over time.
The International Space Station orbits Earth every 90 minutes.
Astronauts age faster in space due to zero gravity.
Your heart beats over 100,000 times a day.
Humans have more than five senses.
Hair and nails continue growing after death.
Babies have more bones than adults.
The human nose can detect over 1 trillion smells.
You can sneeze with your eyes open.
The liver can regenerate itself.
Humans blink about 20 times per minute.
You only use 10% of your brain.
Your stomach gets an entirely new lining every 3-5 days.
Humans can live without a stomach.
Your brain feels pain when you get a headache.
You lose consciousness if you lose 40% of your blood.
Your left lung is smaller than your right lung.
The human body produces about 1.5 liters of saliva daily.
Your ears and nose never stop growing.
You have the same number of neck bones as a giraffe.
Humans can see ultraviolet light.
The inventor of the frisbee was turned into a frisbee after he died.
Bananas grow on plants, not trees.
The Eiffel Tower was originally intended to be built in London.
There's a basketball court on the top floor of the U.S. Supreme Court.
Sharks can live for over 400 years.
The Great Wall of China is visible from the moon.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Tomatoes are technically a fruit.
Mount Everest is the closest point on Earth to space.
Bubble wrap was originally invented as wallpaper.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes.
Coca-Cola was originally green.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
Fortune cookies were invented in China.
Cleopatra lived closer in time to the moon landing than to the construction of the Great Pyramid.
Honey never spoils.
The pig is Scotland's national animal.
Beethoven continued to compose music even after he went deaf.
The guitar has six strings by standard.
The piano was invented in the 1900s.
Mozart wrote his first composition at age five.
The Beatles were originally called The Quarrymen.
Rap music originated in the 2000s.
A standard orchestra has string, woodwind, brass, and percussion sections.
Ed Sheeran writes songs for other artists too.
Vinyl records cannot be played in reverse.
The Great Fire of London happened in 1666.
Nelson Mandela was South Africa's first Black president.
The Roman Empire fell before the invention of the wheel.
The Berlin Wall fell in 1989.
Julius Caesar was assassinated in the Roman Senate.
The Titanic sank on its second voyage.
World War I began in 1914.
The pyramids were built in Egypt thousands of years ago.
Christopher Columbus discovered America in the 1700s.
Thor is the Norse god of thunder.
The phoenix is a mythical bird that rises from its ashes.
Hercules was a Roman god.
Zeus was considered the king of the Greek gods.
Anubis was associated with the afterlife in Egyptian mythology.
Medusa was a kind-hearted goddess.
Poseidon ruled the seas in Greek mythology.
Loki was known as a trickster god.
The Minotaur was a friendly giant.
